verses.verse: וּמֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> Now Moses הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become רֹעֶ֛ה <S%H7462><s%> was pasturing אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹ֛אן <S%H6629><s%> the flock יִתְר֥וֹ <S%H3503><s%> of Jethro חֹתְנ֖וֹ <S%H2859><s%> his father in law כֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest מִדְיָ֑ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian וַיִּנְהַ֤ג <S%H5090><s%> and he led אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצֹּאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> the flock אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> to the backside הַמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> of the desert וַיָּבֹ֛א <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> to the mountain הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God חֹרֵֽבָה׃ <S%H2722><s%> [even] to Horeb

וַ֠יֵּרָא <S%H7200><s%> appeared מַלְאַ֨ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהֹוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> unto בְּלַבַּת־ <S%H3827><s%> unto him in a flame אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst הַסְּנֶ֑ה <S%H5572><s%> of a bush וַיַּ֗רְא <S%H7200><s%> and he looked וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הַסְּנֶה֙ <S%H5572><s%> and behold the bush בֹּעֵ֣ר <S%H1197><s%> burned בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire וְהַסְּנֶ֖ה <S%H5572><s%> and the bush אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <S%H369><s%> was not אֻכָּֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> [was] not consumed

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אָסֻֽרָה־ <S%H5493><s%> I will now turn aside נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now וְאֶרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> and see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּרְאֶ֥ה <S%H4758><s%> sight הַגָּדֹ֖ל <S%H1419><s%> this great הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this מַדּ֖וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> why לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not יִבְעַ֥ר <S%H1197><s%> is not burnt הַסְּנֶֽה׃ <S%H5572><s%> the bush

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And when the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for סָ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> that he turned aside לִרְא֑וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see וַיִּקְרָא֩ <S%H7121><s%> called אֵלָ֨יו <S%H413><s%> about אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> God מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> unto him out of the midst הַסְּנֶ֗ה <S%H5572><s%> of the bush וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2009><s%> Here

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> Draw not nigh הֲלֹ֑ם <S%H1988><s%> hither שַׁל־ <S%H5394><s%> put off נְעָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5275><s%> thy shoes מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from רַגְלֶ֔יךָ <S%H7272><s%> from off thy feet כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הַמָּק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> for the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whereon אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you עוֹמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> thou standest עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and אַדְמַת־ <S%H127><s%> ground קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [is] holy הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> He

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Moreover he said אָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> I [am] the God אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father אֱלֹהֵ֧י <S%H430><s%> the God אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> the God יִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> of Isaac וֵאלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> and the God יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וַיַּסְתֵּ֤ר <S%H5641><s%> hid מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses פָּנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> his face כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for יָרֵ֔א <S%H3372><s%> for he was afraid מֵהַבִּ֖יט <S%H5027><s%> to look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> upon God

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD רָאֹ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> I have surely רָאִ֛יתִי <S%H7200><s%> seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֳנִ֥י <S%H6040><s%> the affliction עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> of my people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> which [are] in Egypt וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צַעֲקָתָ֤ם <S%H6818><s%> their cry שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H8085><s%> and have heard מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> by reason נֹֽגְשָׂ֔יו <S%H5065><s%> of their taskmasters כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יָדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> for I know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַכְאֹבָֽיו׃ <S%H4341><s%> their sorrows

וָאֵרֵ֞ד <S%H3381><s%> And I am come down לְהַצִּיל֣וֹ ׀ <S%H5337><s%> to deliver מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> them out of the hand מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian וּֽלְהַעֲלֹתוֹ֮ <S%H5927><s%> and to bring מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> that הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them up out of that land הַהִוא֒ <S%H1931><s%> he אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land טוֹבָה֙ <S%H2896><s%> unto a good וּרְחָבָ֔ה <S%H7342><s%> and a large אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> flowing חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבָ֑שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto the place הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> of the Canaanites וְהַ֣חִתִּ֔י <S%H2850><s%> and the Hittites וְהָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <S%H567><s%> and the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzites וְהַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> and the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusites

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> behold צַעֲקַ֥ת <S%H6818><s%> Now therefore behold the cry בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בָּ֣אָה <S%H935><s%> is come אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> furthermore רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> unto me and I have also seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלַּ֔חַץ <S%H3906><s%> the oppression אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian לֹחֲצִ֥ים <S%H3905><s%> oppress אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> now לְכָ֔ה <S%H1980><s%> come וְאֶֽשְׁלָחֲךָ֖ <S%H7971><s%> now therefore and I will send אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> thee unto Pharaoh וְהוֹצֵ֛א <S%H3318><s%> that thou mayest bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> my people בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> unto God מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who אָנֹ֔כִי <S%H595><s%> I כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> should אֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> should אוֹצִ֛יא <S%H3318><s%> and that I should bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> Egypt

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> unto thee that אֶֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> you וְזֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> and this לְּךָ֣ הָא֔וֹת <S%H226><s%> Certainly I will be with thee and this [shall be] a token כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Certainly אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> is i שְׁלַחְתִּ֑יךָ <S%H7971><s%> I have sent בְּהוֹצִֽיאֲךָ֤ <S%H3318><s%> thee When thou hast brought forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> the people מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt תַּֽעַבְדוּן֙ <S%H5647><s%> ye shall serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and הָהָ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> upon this mountain הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָֽאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> unto God הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I בָא֮ <S%H935><s%> Behold [when] I come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתִּ֣י <S%H559><s%> and shall say לָהֶ֔ם אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> unto them The God אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of your fathers שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <S%H7971><s%> hath sent אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to וְאָֽמְרוּ־ <S%H559><s%> me unto you and they shall say לִ֣י מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What שְּׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> to me מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What אֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> say אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אֶֽהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> I AM אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> WHO אֶֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> THAT I AM וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus shalt thou say לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶֽהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> I am שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <S%H7971><s%> I AM hath sent אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said ע֨וֹד <S%H5750><s%> moreover אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹאמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> Thus shalt thou say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H1><s%> of your fathers אֱלֹהֵ֨י <S%H430><s%> the God אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> the God יִצְחָ֛ק <S%H3327><s%> of Isaac וֵאלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> and the God יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <S%H7971><s%> hath sent אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to זֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> This שְּׁמִ֣י <S%H8034><s%> me unto you this [is] my name לְעֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וְזֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> and this זִכְרִ֖י <S%H2143><s%> and this [is] my memorial לְדֹ֥ר <S%H1755><s%> unto all דֹּֽר׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations

לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְאָֽסַפְתָּ֞ <S%H622><s%> together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֤ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> unto them The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> of your fathers נִרְאָ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> appeared אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about אֱלֹהֵ֧י <S%H430><s%> the God אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham יִצְחָ֥ק <S%H3327><s%> of Isaac וְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> and of Jacob לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> unto me saying פָּקֹ֤ד <S%H6485><s%> I have surely פָּקַ֙דְתִּי֙ <S%H6485><s%> visited אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶעָשׂ֥וּי <S%H6213><s%> you and [seen] that which is done לָכֶ֖ם בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> to you in Egypt

וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> And I have said אַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> I will bring אֶתְכֶם֮ <S%H853><s%> מֵעֳנִ֣י <S%H6040><s%> you up out of the affliction מִצְרַיִם֒ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> of the Canaanites וְהַ֣חִתִּ֔י <S%H2850><s%> and the Hittites וְהָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <S%H567><s%> and the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzites וְהַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> and the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֑י <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusites אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> flowing חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> and honey

וְשָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> And they shall hearken לְקֹלֶ֑ךָ <S%H6963><s%> to thy voice וּבָאתָ֡ <S%H935><s%> and thou shalt come אַתָּה֩ <S%H859><s%> you וְזִקְנֵ֨י <S%H2205><s%> thou and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֤ם <S%H559><s%> and ye shall say אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> unto him The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God הָֽעִבְרִיִּים֙ <S%H5680><s%> of the Hebrews נִקְרָ֣ה <S%H7136><s%> hath met עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> with וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now נֵֽלֲכָה־ <S%H1980><s%> go נָּ֞א <S%H4994><s%> please דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> journey שְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> we beseech thee three יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> days' בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> into the wilderness וְנִזְבְּחָ֖ה <S%H2076><s%> that we may sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> our God

וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> And I am sure כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> except יִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> will not let אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> that the king מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לַהֲלֹ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> you go וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> except בְּיָ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> hand חֲזָקָֽה׃ <S%H2389><s%> no not by a mighty

וְשָׁלַחְתִּ֤י <S%H7971><s%> And I will stretch out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> my hand וְהִכֵּיתִ֣י <S%H5221><s%> and smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all נִפְלְאֹתַ֔י <S%H6381><s%> with all my wonders אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> which I will do בְּקִרְבּ֑וֹ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst וְאַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> thereof and after כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יְשַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> that he will let you go אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְנָתַתִּ֛י <S%H5414><s%> And I will give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֵ֥ן <S%H2580><s%> favour הָֽעָם־ <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for תֵֽלֵכ֔וּן <S%H1980><s%> go לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תֵלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> go רֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H7387><s%> empty

וְשָׁאֲלָ֨ה <S%H7592><s%> shall borrow אִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> But every woman מִשְּׁכֶנְתָּהּ֙ <S%H7934><s%> of her neighbour וּמִגָּרַ֣ת <S%H1481><s%> and of her that sojourneth בֵּיתָ֔הּ <S%H1004><s%> in her house כְּלֵי־ <S%H3627><s%> jewels כֶ֛סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וּכְלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> and jewels זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וּשְׂמָלֹ֑ת <S%H8071><s%> and raiment וְשַׂמְתֶּ֗ם <S%H7760><s%> and ye shall put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בְּנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> [them] upon your sons וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בְּנֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1323><s%> and upon your daughters וְנִצַּלְתֶּ֖ם <S%H5337><s%> and ye shall spoil אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian
